titleStmt.title: The maner of siting of the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. for Feter Stent,

notesStmt.note: With a caption title, which reads: The true manner of the sitting of the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England, &c. Together with a perfect catalogue of their names, and for what places they serve.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
